text: Hi guys, one of the most important things to do when you're cooking in the kitchen is secure your chopping board
Every house needs a good, large wooden chopping board

You can get a plastic one and that's
fine for your fish and your chicken if you want
But if you want a board that is going to look after you, you need something big
and something that is going to be with you for the whole of your cooking career
What we do not want is something that is round like a carrot or a lemon
with a board that's moving and then you've got a sharp knife in there. It's going to end
in tears. We need to secure that board.
It's the simplest thing on the planet to do
but just get yourself a little T-towel... place it down like that

pour some water on... like this and it will
kind of shape

to whatever shape the surface and the
board is

that was a very very simple tip, but a really
important one and it could save you
having no fingers... Ok, if you like that tip,
then there's probably a lot more that I've done, so click the link and I'll see you there.
